summary: PARKED AT EAGLE MOUNTAIN LAKE BOAT DOCK TO LOAD MY BASS BOAT. PUT THE TRUCK IN PARK AND GOT OUT TO LOAD MY BASS BOAT AND THE TRUCK ROLLED INTO THE LAKE,COMPLETELY SUBMERGED IN THE WATER.. HAVE HEARD ABOUT THE COUNTLESS DODGE ROLLAWAY COMPLAINTS BUT THIS IS UNBELIEVABLE.. HOW MANY MORE VEHICLES OWNERS HAVE TO EXPERIENCE THIS EXTENSIVE INSURANCE CLAIMS BEFORE A REAL INVESTIGATION OCCURS THESE ROTARY SHIFT KNOBS ON THE DASH... THEY HAVE AN INHERENT PROBLEM.
